attributes.long-description:
When Lara Croft is hired to retrieve a mythical object called the Scion, she begins a dangerous search across isolated and desolate words, places untouched for thousands of years. But Lara is not alone; the tombs are guarded by fearsome creatures, and close behind are others desperate to learn the Scions’ powerful secrets. Unlock the past and relive the adventure that revolutionized video gaming all in this re-imagined version of the classic Tomb Raider using today’s technology. Requires Memory Stick DUO™ 1.07GB.

Lara Croft Tomb Raider: Anniversary Edition ©2007 Eidos Interactive Ltd. Developed by Crystal Dynamics, Inc. Published by Eidos, Inc. 2007. attributes.name: Tomb Raider: Anniversary™
